name: I cant concentrate
description:
'I can't concentrate' is a prototype game created by Rebekah Brown, a student in MSc Serious Games and Virtual Reality at the Glasgow School of Art, for her Master's dissertation, under the supervision of Daisy Abbott.

'I can't concentrate' is a game about living with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD). Everyone with ADHD's experience is unique, and this game only tries to represent how different ADHD subtypes may affect certain people.

Disclaimer: this game is accompanied by audio. There is a loud audio alarm in the first scene after the start screen which may startle users if the volume is too loud. This sound effect is triggered for a second time in that scene.
